welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Scugog, Canada! Prepare to be charmed by our beautiful lakeside town and renowned fishing spots. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Scugog has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oshawa Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Oshawa Airport is used for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buttonville Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including shops, restaurants, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying in on private jets, there is a separate terminal with luxurious lounges and VIP services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.
